Text: Sparrows (Icelandic: Þrestir ) is a 2015 internationally co-produced film directed by the 2006 short film oscar nominee Rúnar Rúnarsson, starring Atli Óskar Fjalarsson, Rakel Björk Björnsdóttir and Ingvar Eggert Sigurðsson.
Triplets:<Rúnar Rúnarsson
2:
--------------------
Text: Sparrows (2015 film):  It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section of the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival.

Triplets:<Sparrows
4:
--------------------
Text: Sparrows (2015 film):  Sparrows became a festival darling and on top of its great festival run the film has been honored with 20 international film awards since it was awarded the Golden Shell at the 63rd San Sebastián International Film Festival.
